device_mount: Handheld; Mounted to wall; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
use_cases_desc: E.g. to track users' engagement with public displays
contribution_desc:
ENGAGE, a toolkit that allows to track a user's engagement across multiple devices. 
The system uses a camera based face tracking approach (either when the user is facing the public display or is looking with their eyes onto a smaller (laptop) screen) and app usage informaiton on smartphones to detect engagement. The engagement information is sent to a central analytics server that tracks the user's engagement across multiple devices.
tracking_characteristic: Inside-out tracking; Orientation; Tracking users only
crossdevice_def: "Crucially users are choosing to use many of these devices in parallel-surfing the web while watching TV or glancing up from their laptop at a nearby digital sign."
